German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

halb (“half”) +‎ Pension (“boardinghouse”)

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈhalppaŋzi̯oːn/, /ˈhalppɛnzɪ̆oːn/
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Halbpension f (genitive Halbpension, no plural)

  1. (tourism) half-board

Declension[edit]
